Kindle Oasis E-reader with Leather Charg.text: Very lightweight and portable with excellent battery life.
I like this so much more than the Voyage. The shape makes for easier holding. I only wish this devise was maybe 2 inches taller then it would look like a real book

Replacing older reader without a light and traveling overseas soon. With electronics in the cabin under scrutiny, this very small and very lightweight reader fits the bill! Perfect in small purses and large pockets. I can read without annoying seatmate with cabin overhead seat light. Easy to hold in either hand and screen adjusts for whichever direction you're holding it.

I purchased the Kindle Oasis because I was growing increasingly tired of the glare and cumbersome size of reading off my iPad. So the portability is great. And of course, I went for the most expensive, because I wanted the extra battery life. And while the length of time it stays charged is nice, charges very quickly, it's still overpriced. I love the non-glare screen, you can literally read this anywhere. But the wifi connectivity is patchy at best. I have to go upstairs in my home and stand close to the router for the Oasis to connect, this is very annoying. Wouldn't be a big deal if I only read from this one device. But I read from another and picking up where I left off is a pain most times. Non of my issues are really a big deal, but for $300 I don't feel like I should have any issues.

This is not an upgrade by any means! My three year old kindle outperformed Oasis.Battery life better than a week with the lights on lowest setting Magnetic connector is poorly designed and grows weak Two pieces to keep up with; unsnaps constantly Amazon Customer Services promises it will resolved in an update

This is my first e-reader. I didn't know about the odd refresh and it took a little while to get used to but I do love how small and light it is and that I do not have to remember to plug it in everyday

# **Product Recommendation Guide: Kindle Oasis**
## **Overview**
The Kindle Oasis comes with high praise from reviewers, boasting over 60 assessments that yield a strong average score of 4-star ratings across its user base. This device offers exceptional mobility and impressive battery longevity due to its ergonomic design and refined features compared to previous models.
## **Customer Sentiment**
Overwhelmingly favorable sentiments dominate the reviews—positivity rates reach up to 90%, signifying broad satisfaction among users regarding their choice to purchase the Kindle oasis.
## *What Customers Love*
### Portability and Lightweight Design
A frequent highlight is how users enjoy the seamless blend between form and function. As one reviewer notes: *Very lightweight* and *portable*, ensuring it remains at hand for all reading sessions without burden.
### Enhanced Battery Life
Reviewers appreciate significant improvements in power efficiency, as seen when they state *Battery life is remarkable.* and *Better than a full week's use with the backlight set low*.
### Improved Holding Experience
Notably, customers favor the updated handle design which promotes ease of grip and prolonged comfort during extended reading periods. One comment underscores this sentiment: *Much improved shape* making it 'easier to hold*', elevating usability significantly.
## Common Issues
Despite widespread acclaim, some concerns persist. For instance, complaints about relative price point versus performance were evident. A dissatisfied reviewer suggests: *Not worth the extra cost*, noting that the older model might have performed equally well under certain conditions but offered greater value-for-money.
Additionally, the need for improvement in display brightness under intense sunlight is also flagged: *Glare still quite noticeable in bright light circumstances* highlights challenges encountered while trying to read outdoors or indoors against bright backgrounds.
## Final Takeaway 
**For Whom Should It Be Purchased?** Prospective buyers looking for unparalleled convenience, superior battery endurance, robust waterproofing capabilities alongside sleek aesthetics are encouraged to consider the Kindle Owlasis. Its portability allows you to carry your library wherever you go; just remember that even though it’s slightly heavier than other options, most find the tradeoff worthwhile considering its enhanced ergonomics, longer battery life, and advanced feature set designed specifically for readers' needs. 
**Why To Buy:** The Kindle Oasis is ideal if prioritizing long-lasting usage times and an enjoyable, uncluttered e-read experience is crucial. The combination of weightlessness, intuitive operation, and built-in tech advancements ensures uninterrupted hours spent immersed within digital pages without worrying too much about recharging schedules or external factors affecting readability. Ultimately, those ready to invest in top-tier technology tailored precisely towards enhancing the joy of reading will likely see the Oasis as delivering a premium yet balanced experience akin to owning luxury-grade accessories made especially for them — a discerning aficionado of literature.
